# generated by cmake-generator
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

add_library(game-relay-server STATIC 
  address.c
  connections.c
  listener.c
  listeners.c
  req_close.c
  req_connect.c
  req_listen.c
  req_packet.c
  server.c
  unique_id.c
  utils.c)

include(Tornado.cmake)
set_tornado(game-relay-server)

target_include_directories(game-relay-server PUBLIC ../include)


target_link_libraries(game-relay-server PUBLIC 
  serialize
  flood
  imprint
  monotonic-time
  secure-random
  guise-serialize
  guise-session-client
  datagram-transport)
